text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
...You again? Look, this is getting<n>annoying. What is it you
want with me,<n>anyway?
choice_data_list: Just to hear what you have to say.
Just to hear what you have to say.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...Who says I have anything to say?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: The thing is, I have nothing.Nothing. A pretty face, a dumbdoll. That's me.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Modeling was fun at first, you know.<n>They'd ask me to look
happy, or<n>strike a pose, and they'd heap on the<n>praise
when I did it. I was proud of<n>myself.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
They wanted a certain image from<n>me, so that's what I
modeled myself<n>after, what I performed.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But then one day, I was walking<n>down the street, when I
saw this huge<n>poster of myself. And I thought...<n>"Who's
that?"

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"This image of perfection brought to<n>life, like she was born
to look pretty.<n>Who is that?"

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Didn't have to think twice to know<n>the answer—"That's
'Gold City,'<n>duh."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: The real question was... "Who's theone standing here staring at her? Whoam I ?"

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
It scared me. I wanted to scream, and<n>I just, I couldn't take
it anymore.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
My mind just went blank and I took<n>off running, and I ran
and ran...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: And that's when I saw it... the sunset.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I legitimately had no clue where I<n>was. And I tripped... I
don't even<n>know how many times, my legs were<n>caked in
mud, my favorite dress was<n>in tatters...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: But the sky, I don't know why, but itwas just so pretty.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...And that's when it hits me.This—this is me.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: My legs hurt like hell, and my lungsfelt like they were about to burst, but itall just felt like me.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: So I came to Tracen. To run and run,and to become me. To carve thereal me into everyone'smemory.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: But...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: (The honk of a car horn cuts her off.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
City! Thank goodness you're here!<n>Did you not get any of
my calls?<n>Come on, you'll be late for work.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Manager... Sorry, we were, er, busy<n>talking... Oh wow, yeah,
that's a lot of<n>missed calls.

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
Well, whatever it was, I'm glad I<n>found you. I assume
something<n>happened with that trainer?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Yeah, something like that. Sorry, uh,<n>work. Right, let's go.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Oh, can we head back to the academy<n>real quick though? I
need to reserve<n>the training course.

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
...Listen, City. Don't you think it's<n>about time to give it up?
You're worn<n>out, both in body and mind. You've<n>tried so,
so hard. Isn't it tiring?

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
You don't like people judging you by<n>your looks, but that's
just how it is.<n>You have to learn to accept it.

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
I'll make you a top model. You should<n>be up on the stage
where you'll shine<n>the brightest. Forcing yourself into a<n>
world where you don't belong only<n>brings pain.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
A world where I don't belong... Hah,<n>maybe you're right. I
thought I was<n>getting somewhere, and look at me<n>now.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Yeah... Maybe it's time to give up.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Gold City slams the car door shut,<n>and the engine revs up.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For a moment, I just watch them<n>drive off in a daze. But
then, I notice<n>something on the ground.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The lock screen's set to a picture of<n>a sunset. It's a bit
blurry—her hand<n>must've been shaking. But still, it's a<n>
beautiful sight.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I replay her words in my mind over<n>and over. For her,
running is a way to<n>become her true self.
choice_data_list: I should get this to her!

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text: City, wait here a moment. I'm going<n>to go talk to the staff.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Mm, all right.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
...Damn, okay. She got a big name<n>photographer for this
shoot. Bet he'll<n>make me look really pretty.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: You know... Maybe this is where I<n>belong after all.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wait, you... Why... How?!
choice_data_list: You dropped your dream back there.
You dropped your dream back there.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: My dream? You're literally making<n>zero sense.

As confusion crosses her face, I pull<n>out the phone and
show her the lock<n>screen.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Huuuh?! What the—Why do you have<n>my phone?! And why
were you<n>looking through it?!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: That's not my dream! Notanymore—I quit already!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Give it back!
She snatches the phone from my<n>hand.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I'm done. I'm through. I'm giving up!<n>And I'm deleting this
picture!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: I'll delete it right here, right now! I<n>swear, I'll... I'll delete it...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...Why?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Why can't I just... press delete?
choice_data_list: You don't need to throw away the real "you."
You don't need to throw away the real "you."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Who are you, anyway? Like honestly.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You're a nuisance, and a<n>goody-two-shoes, and a stalker,<n>
eavesdropper, phone peeper—you<n>have zero tact, you're
clingy, and so,<n>so damn annoying!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: First you just wanna hear me out,and now it's "don't throw yourselfaway!" You never make any fricking sense! Seriously, who the hell doyou think you are?!
choice_data_list: Your trainer! If you'll have me.
Your trainer! If you'll have me.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Ughhhhh, I am SO done with you!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Fine then. Do it! Be my trainer. We'll<n>see how fast you can
make me run!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: But I swear, treat me like a dollonce, and I'll kick you so hardyou'll regret ever talking to me!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: What do you mean, "sounds good"?!<n>Ugh, I can't.

text_block_list.name: Gold City's Manager
text_block_list.text: City, sorry to keep you waiting! Oh,<n>uh... You must be...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Never mind that, I'll tell you later.<n>We've got work to do.
You, wait here.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
My manager's kind of a helicopter,<n>so I'll introduce you to
her. As my...<n>my trainer.
